page.title: Our Materials
page.intro: Every piece in the Têtu collection is crafted from deadstock fabrics sourced from the world's most prestigious luxury fashion houses.

upcycled.title: Upcycled Luxury
upcycled.description: We rescue premium materials that would otherwise go to waste. Each fabric tells a story of craftsmanship from renowned ateliers, given new life in our contemporary designs.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Future
sustainable.description: By utilizing deadstock, we reduce waste and minimize our environmental footprint. Luxury doesn't have to come at the cost of our planet.

vision.title: The Vision
vision.description: Têtu represents a new era of streetwear—one that honors heritage craftsmanship while pushing boundaries. We believe in creating pieces that are both timeless and contemporary, sustainable yet luxurious. Our name, meaning "stubborn" in French, reflects our unwavering commitment to quality, sustainability, and innovation.

teaser.title: Digital Twin NFT
